```text
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate mine at position(41, -81)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position 41, -81)

### Iron plate mine at position(4, -61)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position 4, -61)

### Stone brick mine at position(-16, -51)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position -16, -51)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to connect belts directly from a StoneFurnace
-  Use an inserter to take items from StoneFurnace before connecting belts.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors when placing an entity too far away from the agent
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place the entity. The maximum placement distance is 10 tiles.

### Errors when getting an entity at a certain position
- Ensure that the entity exists at the specified position and that the position is accurate. Double-check the coordinates and the entity type.

### Errors when extracting items from an entity
- Ensure that the target entity exists at the specified position and that it contains the item you are trying to extract.

## NAMESPACE

### Utility Functions:
None

### Variables:
None
```
